name: tavs-spinner-panel
description: TAVS Spinner panel for Grafana - animated spinner with speed based on metrics

scripts.copy-files: cp src/plugin.json dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/ && mkdir -p dist/img && cp img/logo.svg dist/img/ && cp img/screenshot.png dist/img/
scripts.full-build: npm run build && npm run copy-files
